4BQ 30 SSW GDV 15 SE SDY 45 W N60 35 NNW BIS 35 S BIS 45 SW MBG 15 N
RAP 30 ESE SHR 55 W 4BQ.

GEN TSTMS ARE FCST TO THE RIGHT OF A LINE FROM 40 W ALO 15 WSW MCW
15 W SPW 25 NNW OFK 35 ESE BUB 15 NW EAR 45 SSW EAR 45 ENE DDC 25
